headline: Morgan Stanley Reiterates Buy on Globe Life (GL) Shares
summary: Globe Life Inc. (NYSE:GL) is one of the 13 High-Quality S&P 500 Financial Stocks According to Hedge Funds. Globe Life Inc. headline: Is Globe Life (GL) Pricing Reflect Its Strong Excess Returns And Low P/E Multiple
summary: If you are wondering whether Globe Life's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you weigh what the market is pricing in. Globe Life shares last closed at US$145.26, with returns of 0.6% over 7 days, 4.8% over 30 days, 4.9% year to date, 14.9% over 1 year, 23.6% over 3 years and 55.7% over 5 years, giving plenty of price history for a closer look at valuation. Recent coverage has focused on Globe Life's role as a US insurer...
